ResearchProjectDef.label: basic farcaster research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start down the path of technologies associated with farcasters, a fascinating piece of ancient, forgotten technology that allows instantaneous travel between distant planets. Basic research notes point to the existence of an abandoned network of ancient farcasters on the moon Sigma Alcyon IIb. Provided you can get a Stable Singularity Core to power it, you may be able to jury-rig a machine to link with them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced farcaster research
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using materials found on Sigma Alcyon IIb, you can build a more powerful farcaster, that can be upgraded with different technologies and materials to unlock access to even more distant networks of abandoned farcasters
